document.full_text: federal officials vowed urgent support on sunday for a region devastated by the deadliest u.s. natural disaster since hurricane katrina, even as they acknowledged recovery would not be quick or easy.
document.title: top officials survey storm-ravaged south
lines_and_colors: federal officials vowed urgent support on sunday for a region devastated by the deadliest u.s. natural disaster since hurricane katrina, even as they acknowledged recovery would not be quick or easy.
